msbt.message: My goodness, I just saw Gulliver sleeping down at the beach.I tried waking him, but he mumbled something about and went back to sleep. That silly seagull! I confess, I'm a wee bit worried about him napping in a place like that
K.K. is here today! Isn't it wonderful? He'll be performing at the plaza, so we must go see him, !
I heard Label is coming to our island today.I can't wait to say hello, but what shall I wear? One of my most stylish outfits, of course.
It seems Saharah is visiting the island today, .The things she sellsI tell you, they have SO much personality! I'm a huge fan, darling.
K.K. has been playing in front of Resident Services today, you know.He's probably taking requests right now too. You should go ask him to play something, !
It's Sunday, my dear, and that means Daisy Mae should be around here somewhere.
I spotted a strange boat anchored off the north shore earlier.What on earth IS it doing here? I tell you, I have a funny feeling about it, !
It's so strange I feelsomething. Like some invisible entity is near. It's sending chills down my spine!
Oh, that's right! Have you been to your birthday concert yet?I can't believe K.K. sang a special song just for you! I'm terribly jealous, !
! Did you know that K.K. is HERE, on this island, right <10_5 />NOW?! Apparently he's playing a concert to celebrate somebody's birthday! Isn't that lovely?
I saw Mabel just a bit ago. I wonder what kind of clothing she brought? I must go check.
It seems C.J. has come to our little island for a visit today.Maybe it's his affable attitude, but I always end up bringing him soooo many fish, !
I saw Flick not long ago. Just remember, you mustn't judge a book by its cover. I promise he's a kind and gentle soul. It's adorable how excited he gets when you give him a bug!
Kicks is here today, you know. I saw him just a moment ago in the plaza, . Each and every item he sells is an absolute gem. I must confess, I am quite the repeat customer.
Why, just a moment ago I saw dear Celeste. I wonder if she has come to look at the stars? Is it just me or do the stars shine just a bit brighter on the days she visits?

Ah, ! I must ask you something rather personal.I wonder, have you sensed anything unusual about the island lately?I can't explain it exactly, but I have sensed some sort of presenceon the island. I am quite sensitive to such things, you know, and I tell you, this strange presence It is full of energy! I have felt it draw near to me several times. But when I turn to look There's nothing there! Anyhoo, I'm sure it's nothing to worry about, .

Why, , have you heard? Leif has set up his shop over in the event plaza. I'm quite keen to see what kind of fabulous plants that adorable little horticulturist has on offer.I like to think I have a green thumb, you knowbut it's really more of a chartreuse thumb, darling.

Have you heard the latest gossip? Someone washed up on the shore! We do seem to get a lot of that here. This fellow looks different from the other, but there's something familiar about him. So strange, !
You know, I saw someone on the island earlier I'd never seen before. I wonderwho could it have been?
